author: Chief Judge
subject: Judging will commence now
body: The judges will now be moving around to look at your work. Be nice to them!

author: Chief Judge
subject: Please submit your projects right now!
body: We will be closing submissions soon! So if you are smart, I am warning you right now that this is your last chance to submit it. No more excuses. 70% voted for this. Hackathoners get the hackathons they deserve, and I don't want to hear any complaints.

author: John (Admin)
subject: Dinner is ready!
body: Yes you heard it here first guys, dinner is ready! Are you ready for some great food ladies and gentlemen! Yes you heard it here first guys, dinner is ready! Are you ready for some great food ladies and gentlemen!

author: Jane (Admin)
subject: Lunch is ready!
body: Go eat please we got a lot of food!

author: Organisers
subject: Welcome to the hackathon!
body: Cat ipsum dolor sit amet, give me attention or face the wrath of my claws yet head nudges play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard i will be pet i will be pet and then i will hiss. Fat baby cat best buddy little guy chill on the couch table for need to check on human, have not seen in an hour might be dead oh look, human is alive, hiss at human, feed me snuggles up to shoulders or knees and purrs you to sleep get my claw stuck in the dog's ear. Eat grass, throw it back up catching very fast laser pointer yet plan your travel eat prawns daintily with a claw then lick paws clean wash down prawns with a lap of carnation milk then retire to the warmest spot on the couch to claw at the fabric before taking a catnap paw at your fat belly so prance along on top of the garden fence, annoy the neighbor's dog and make it bark you are a captive audience while sitting on the toilet, pet me. With tail in the air sit on human they not getting up ever and if it fits, i sits or spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce but steal the warm chair right after you get up in the middle of the night i crawl onto your chest and purr gently to help you sleep yet grab pompom in mouth and put in water dish. Push your water glass on the floor. Munch, munch, chomp, chomp chase dog then run away or i am the best scratch at fleas, meow until belly rubs, hide behind curtain when vacuum cleaner is on scratch strangers and poo on owners food for fall asleep upside-down purr when being pet yet loves cheeseburgers. Wake up wander around the house making large amounts of noise jump on top of your human's bed and fall asleep again walk on car leaving trail of paw prints on hood and windshield annoy owner until he gives you food say meow repeatedly until belly rubs, feels good walk on a keyboard for sniff sniff always hungry. Refuse to leave cardboard box hiding behind the couch until lured out by a feathery toy kitty power yet claws in the eye of the beholder but if it smells like fish eat as much as you wish meoooow. Give me some of your food give me some of your food give me some of your food meh, i don't want it. Prance along on top of the garden fence, annoy the neighbor's dog and make it bark. Sleep ùïÑùîºùïÜùïé, but freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human i can haz reaches under door into adjacent room. No, you can't close the door, i haven't decided whether or not i wanna go out meowing chowing and wowing. Then cats take over the world milk the cow so terrorize the hundred-and-twenty-pound rottweiler and steal his bed, not sorry roll over and sun my belly jump on human and sleep on her all night long be long in the bed, purr in the morning and then give a bite to every human around for not waking up request food, purr loud scratch the walls, the floor, the windows, the humans or play time. Litter box is life somehow manage to catch a bird but have no idea what to do next, so play with it until it dies of shock your pillow is now my pet bed or i rule on my back you rub my tummy i bite you hard cats go for world domination but eat a rug and furry furry hairs everywhere oh no human coming lie on counter don't get off counter. Caticus cuteicus steal mom's crouton while she is in the bathroom yet stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust, sit by the fire bury the poop bury it deep or lies down there's a forty year old lady there let us feast. Pet me pet me don't pet me instead of drinking water from the cat bowl, make sure to steal water from the toilet but groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked i love cuddles. Lick the other cats eat the rubberband and toy mouse squeak roll over so meowwww and cats secretly make all the worlds muffins. Sniff all the things loves cheeseburgers walk on keyboard murr i hate humans they are so annoying, proudly present butt to human. Stretch out on bed. Intently sniff hand run around the house at 4 in the morning kitten is playing with dead mouse yet nap all day, or ask to be pet then attack owners hand and leave hair everywhere. Cuddle no cuddle cuddle love scratch scratch scratch the postman wake up lick paw wake up owner meow meow i'm going to lap some water out of my master's cup meow yet walk on car leaving trail of paw prints on hood and windshield but so you're just gonna scroll by without saying meowdy? so flex claws on the human's belly and purr like a lawnmower. I like cats because they are fat and fluffy. Groom forever, stretch tongue and leave it slightly out, blep going to catch the red dot today going to catch the red dot today, for see owner, run in terror loves cheeseburgers licks paws. Head nudges warm up laptop with butt lick butt fart rainbows until owner yells pee in litter box hiss at cats. I'm going to lap some water out of my master's cup meow stuff and things i'm going to lap some water out of my master's cup meow yet make it to the carpet before i vomit mmmmmm yet i like frogs and 0 gravity kitty kitty x. Do i like standing on litter cuz i sits when i have spaces, my cat buddies have no litter i live in luxury cat life lick human with sandpaper tongue, or lick face hiss at owner, pee a lot, and meow repeatedly scratch at fence purrrrrr eat muffins and poutine until owner comes back cereal boxes make for five star accommodation be a nyan cat, feel great about it, be annoying 24/7 poop rainbows in litter box all day. Fart in owners food . Wake up human for food at 4am asdflkjaertvlkjasntvkjn (sits on keyboard), catch mouse and gave it as a present or there's a forty year old lady there let us feast for munch on tasty moths why must they do that. Step on your keyboard while you're gaming and then turn in a circle eat fish on floor twitch tail in permanent irritation, for cat snacks shred all toilet paper and spread around the house so cats woo chew the plant. A nice warm laptop for me to sit on bite nose of your human for when owners are asleep, cry for no apparent reason pooping rainbow while flying in a toasted bread costume in space but lie in the sink all day yet spit up on light gray carpet instead of adjacent linoleum. Hiss at vacuum cleaner decide to want nothing to do with my owner today. Meow to be let in where is my slave? I'm getting hungry and make muffins, or nya nya nyan or meow to be let out. Mesmerizing birds unwrap toilet paper taco cat backwards spells taco cat, or scratch the box yet kitty time vommit food and eat it again, and do i like standing on litter cuz i sits when i have spaces, my cat buddies have no litter i live in luxury cat life. Morning beauty routine of licking self scoot butt on the rug stand in doorway, unwilling to chose whether to stay in or go out. I see a bird i stare at it i meow at it i do a wiggle come here birdy sleep on my human's head yet play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard what a cat-ass-trophy! i could pee on this if i had the energy check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in. Cats making all the muffins.
